item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 19, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:

3. Kowloon Walled City: Heterotopia in a Space of Disappearance (2013) (72 points | 32 comments)

22. In Defense of Y'All (101 points | 181 comments)

24. Updates to H-1B (380 points | 1082 comments)
25. Moon (2959 points | 248 comments)
26. Alignment faking in large language models (141 points | 118 comments)
27. Amazon workers to strike at multiple US warehouses during busy holiday season (220 points | 181 comments)

29. Analyzing the World Chess Championship 2024: Empirical synthesized approach (33 points | 35 comments)
